T02D3306=D3402:1b-1: shr'i badzra a'a sa na s'adha nam /
T02D3306=D3402:1b-3: dpal rdo rje gdan gyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3306=D3402:1b-4: dpal rdo rje gdan la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3306=D3402:1b-5: yon tan tshogs kyi gzhir gyur gzhan [dd] don bla
T02D3306=D3402:1b-6: ma de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D3306=D3402:1b-7: // dpal ldan rdo rje gdan zhes phun sum tshogs
T02D3306=D3402:1b-8: min 'joms shing 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa
T02D3306=D3402:1b-9: // // gang zhig dul zhing zhi ba mchog gi
T02D3306=D3402:1b-10: sangs rgyas nyid kyi de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs gyur
T02D3306=D3402:1b-11: // // pa // sna tshogs kha dog gis spras
T02D3306=D3402:1b-12: brgyan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs bdag gis
T02D3306=D3402:1b-13: // // pa // bri bar bya // de la
T02D3306=D3402:1b-14: mdun du 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho gas bcom ldan
T02D3306=D3402:1b-15: 'das sku mdog dang phyag la sogs pa dang ldan
T02D3306=D3402:1b-17: me tog la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3306=D3402:1b-18: aom na mo aaksho bhya:ya h'um /
T02D3306=D3402:1b-19: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:1b-20: so sor lan gsum gsum du dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3306=D3402:1b-21: aom na mo bee ro tsa n'a ya aom /
T02D3306=D3402:1b-22: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:1b-23: aom na mo ratna sambha w'a ya tr'am /
T02D3306=D3402:1b-24: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:1b-25: aom na mo aa mi t'a bh'a ya hr'i:/
T02D3306=D3402:1b-26: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-2: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-3: aom na mo lo tsa n'a ye lam /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-4: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-5: aom na mo m'a ma kee mam /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-6: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-7: aom na mo panta r'a ye pam /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-8: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-9: aom na mo t'a r'a ye t'am /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-10: aom badzra pushpe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-11: slar yang mi bskyod pa'i gzugs rdo rje gdan la
T02D3306=D3402:2a-12: mang zhing ches rab tu mang ba'i me tog dbul
T02D3306=D3402:2a-13: bar bya'o // rim pa 'di nyid kyis te /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-14: aom badzra dh'u pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-15: aom badzra gandhe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-16: aom badzra nee bi dye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-17: aom badzra d'i pe h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-18: zhes pa la sogs pas mchod pa'i cho ga byas nas /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-19: byams pa la sogs pa bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas so //
T02D3306=D3402:2a-20: de nas rang gi snying gar aa yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ;
T02D3306=D3402:2a-21: de'i steng du h'um yig gser gyi kha dog lta
T02D3306=D3402:2a-22: bu de las 'od zer 'phros pas bla ma dang
T02D3306=D3402:2a-23: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bltas la
T02D3306=D3402:2a-24: / de nas khrus dang me tog la sogs pa
T02D3306=D3402:2a-25: mchod pa'i sprin rab tu 'phro bas yang dag par
T02D3306=D3402:2a-26: / mchod de / de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-27: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-28: dge ba yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D3306=D3402:2a-29: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3306=D3402:2b-0: rgyal ba'i lam bsten pa @2b dang ;
T02D3306=D3402:2b-1: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa yang bya ste /
T02D3306=D3402:2b-2: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D3306=D3402:2b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D3306=D3402:2b-4: de nas stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3306=D3402:2b-5: chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D3306=D3402:2b-6: yi ge'i gzugs byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bar bdag nyid kyis blta bar bya'o //
T02D3306=D3402:2b-7: brtan par bya ba'i don du sngags brjod par bya ste /
T02D3306=D3402:2b-8: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D3306=D3402:2b-9: de bzhin du 'od zer gyi gzugs de yongs su
T02D3306=D3402:2b-10: gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la de'i steng
T02D3306=D3402:2b-11: du h'um ngo // aa la sogs pa dbyangs yig bcu drug gis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D3306=D3402:2b-12: gzhan yang ye ge ka la sogs pa'i sde tshan rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D3306=D3402:2b-13: ma lus pa kha dog dkar po'o //
T02D3306=D3402:2b-14: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs su bsam par bya'o //
T02D3306=D3402:2b-15: de'i steng du yi ge h'um gi rnam pa'i sa bon no //
T02D3306=D3402:2b-16: de yongs su gyur ba las rdo rje mdog ser po'o //
T02D3306=D3402:2b-17: rdo rje de'i lte ba la yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D3306=D3402:2b-18: de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje
T02D3306=D3402:2b-19: gdan gyi gzugs kha dog gser gyi mdog lta bu
T02D3306=D3402:2b-20: de'i gdan bdud rnam par bzhi ste /
T02D3306=D3402:2b-21: de yang phung po dang nyon mongs pa dang 'chi bdag dang lha'i bu'i bdud rnams ser po dang /
T02D3306=D3402:2b-24: sngon po'i mdog can rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D3306=D3402:2b-25: du gzugs 'di rnams rnam par bsgom par byas nas
T02D3306=D3402:2b-26: / bdud 'di rnams kyis yongs su byas pa'i seng
T02D3306=D3402:2b-27: ge'i khri de'i steng du sna tshogs padma dang rdo
T02D3306=D3402:2b-28: rje la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das zhal gcig phyag
T02D3306=D3402:2b-29: gnyis pa rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa
T02D3306=D3402:2b-30: phyag g-yas pas gnon gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa
T02D3306=D3402:2b-31: / / phyag g-yon pa 'dzong bar bkan nas gnas pa'o //
T02D3306=D3402:2b-32: na bza' dmar po sku la bsnams pa zhi ba'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3306=D3402:2b-33: de nas nga rgyal bskyed par bya ste /
T02D3306=D3402:2b-34: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a wa a'atma ko&amp ;
T02D3306=D3402:2b-36: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas su byang chub
T02D3306=D3402:2b-37: sems dpa' byams pa sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis
T02D3306=D3402:2b-38: pa ral pa'i cod pan 'phyang ba phyag g-yas na
T02D3306=D3402:3a-1: bsnams pa phyag g-yon na klu shing gi yal ga me tog dang bcas pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-2: de bzhin du g-yon na byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
T02D3306=D3402:3a-3: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog dkar ba phyag
T02D3306=D3402:3a-4: g-yas na rin po che'i rnga yab bsnams pa /
T02D3306=D3402:3a-5: phyag g-yon na padma bsnams pa /
T02D3306=D3402:3a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la blta zhing 'dug pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-7: de nas yan lag drug la dgod par bya ste /
T02D3306=D3402:3a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan gnyis la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-9: de'i steng du yi ge kshim mdog dkar po'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-10: rna ba gnyis la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge dzam mdog sngon po'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-11: sna'i bu ga gnyis su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge kham mdog ser po'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-12: lce la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge gam mdog dmar po'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-13: dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge skam mdog ljang gu //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-14: nu ma'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D3306=D3402:3a-15: du yi ge sam mdog dkar po'o zhes bya ba
T02D3306=D3402:3a-16: ni yan lag drug la dgod par bsgom par bya'o
T02D3306=D3402:3a-17: // de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3306=D3402:3a-18: 'khor la yi ga h'um yongs su gyur pa las
T02D3306=D3402:3a-19: // rdo rje'o // de'i lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-20: de nas mgo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D3306=D3402:3a-21: du yi ge aom yongs su gyur pa las 'khor
T02D3306=D3402:3a-23: de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D3306=D3402:3a-24: yi ge aom mo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan
T02D3306=D3402:3a-25: 'das kyi sku rnam par dag pa bsgom pa'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-26: mgrin par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi
T02D3306=D3402:3a-27: ge aa yongs su gyur pa las padma 'dab ma
T02D3306=D3402:3a-29: de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D3306=D3402:3a-30: yi ge a'a: 'o zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan
T02D3306=D3402:3a-31: 'das kyi gsung rnam par dag pa bsgom pa'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-32: lte ba'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D3306=D3402:3a-33: du yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa las rdo
T02D3306=D3402:3a-35: de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um ngo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D3306=D3402:3a-36: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs rnam par dag pa bsgom pa'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3a-37: sangs rgyas bsgrub cing sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu ster ba zhes bya'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3b-0: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das @3b snying
T02D3306=D3402:3b-1: ga'i 'od zer gyis bkug nas dza:h'um bam ho:zhes bya
T02D3306=D3402:3b-2: ba'i yi ge bzhis mdun du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3b-5: gdan dang bsang gtor yang dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3b-6: phyis ni 'o thug la sogs pa'i ston mo yang
T02D3306=D3402:3b-7: dbul bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdud rtsi myang
T02D3306=D3402:3b-9: sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3306=D3402:3b-10: zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'dis bstod par bya'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3b-11: de nas ye shes sems dpa' dang bcas pas dam
T02D3306=D3402:3b-12: tshig sems dpa' dang gcig tu byas nas sa ma
T02D3306=D3402:3b-13: ya stvam sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam
T02D3306=D3402:3b-14: aa ham aom a'a:h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gnyis
T02D3306=D3402:3b-16: de nas bsgoms pas skyon sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3306=D3402:3b-17: aom a'a:badzra h'um sv'a h'a zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3306=D3402:3b-18: de nas bsod nams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D3306=D3402:3b-19: chub tu bsngos nas gshegs su gsol te ji ltar
T02D3306=D3402:3b-21: bsod nams 'di yis sems can thams cad de bzhin
T02D3306=D3402:3b-22: gshegs pa'i ye shes myur du thob par gyur cig
T02D3306=D3402:3b-23: / rje btsun rdo rje gdan gyi man ngag gi
T02D3306=D3402:3b-24: sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rdzogs so //
